Key Match Events: Josh Hart recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 15 rebounds, and 10 assists
Hart's 15 rebounds and 10 assists were part of a 17-3 run in the second quarter
Jonas Valanciunas scored 22 points off the bench for the Wizards
The Knicks took a 21-point lead at 120-99 on Towns' dunk with 4:21 left
